person.persName: Thomas Edrington (Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter and convict)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Jeremiah Edrington and Melinda Lowell Edrington. Married to Mary E. Edrington. Carpenter in Jeffersonville, Indiana, in 1850. Resident of Jefferson County in 1860. Convicted of the murder of Mary E. Edrington in the Jefferson Circuit Court on January 20, 1863. Sentenced to three years and nine months imprisonment in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort.
